page.title: 07The Methodist Church.
page.content: The{Methodist Church}was built in{1862 and the{Sunday School}was built in {1883. There are{two services}on a{Sunday, one in the morning when about 30-40 people attend and one in the evening at 6:00p.m. There are no services held during the week. The Methodist Church is a small church and has no choir and there are no parades at the Church. There is a{Fellowship meeting}which is held once a month on a Wednesday. During the year, there is a{Chapel {Anniversary}and also a{Sunday School {Anniversary.}There is also a{Harvest {Festival}and a{Christmas Supper.
